channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's former assistant testifies in hush money trial
item.description: Donald Trump's former assistant Rhona Graff is testifying Friday in the hush money trial. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Fed's preferred inflation gauge shows price pressures stayed elevated last month
item.description: A measure of inflation closely tracked by the Federal Reserve remained uncomfortably high in March, likely reinforcing the Fed’s reluctance to cut interest rates anytime soon and underscoring a burden for President Joe Biden’s re-election bid

item.title: Nuclear Power/IAEA Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Nuclear Power/IAEA Fast Facts and learn more about the International Atomic Energy Agency and nuclear power.

item.title: Trump trial updates: Trump had contacts for McDougal and Daniels, assistant testifies
item.description: Follow the latest developments in former President Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: Mark David Chapman Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Mark David Chapman Fast Facts and learn more about the life of the man who killed musician John Lennon.

item.title: Long flu season winds down in US
item.description: The U.S. flu season appears to be over

item.title: Columbia president faces key vote of censure from faculty as protests continue nationwide
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests continue at major US universities where several schools have called police on protesters, leading to the arrests of hundreds across the country. Follow for live updates.

item.title: WATCH: Costumed riders bring 'Planet of the Apes' to San Francisco
item.description: Riders dressed like the characters from "Planet of the Apes" brought the movies to life under the Golden Gate Bridge this week, surprising locals.

item.title: Tony Awards Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about the Tony Awards, which honor achievements on Broadway.

item.title: Severe weather, including tornado threat, expected to impact the Heartland
item.description: The highest tornado threat is around Des Moines, Iowa; Omaha, Nebraska; and Kansas City, Missouri.
